nodes.text: Bellassa was an astronomical object located in the galaxy's Core Worlds. It was connected via the Hydian Way hyperspace route to Skako and Fedalle.

Bellassa was first mentioned in Where in the Galaxy Are the Worlds of Star Wars: The Force Awakens?. In Star Wars Legends Bellassa first appeared in the 2005 young reader novel, The Last of the Jedi: The Desperate Mission.
